headline: Canada Colocation Data Center Portfolio Report and Directory 2026: Detailed Analysis of 117 Existing Data Centers, 30 Upcoming Data Centers, and 52 Major Operators/Investors
summary: Discover the comprehensive Canada Data Center Market Database, offering in-depth insights into colocation data centers across the nation. Analyze 117 existing and 30 upcoming facilities in key locations such as Toronto, Montreal, and Vancouver. Explore details on white-floor space, IT load capacity, and retail colocation pricing. Notable operators include IREN and Equinix, with new projects poised to add 10 GW of capacity. Tailored for data center REITs, construction contractors, infrastructure
